description: The function should return True if the second string is a permutation of the first string, otherwise False.

prompts.prompt: There is code that contains a logic error. May you fix the logic error? The function 'is_permutation' should take two strings 's1' and 's2' as input. It should return True if the second string is a permutation of the first string, otherwise False. def is_permutation(s1, s2): return sorted(s1) == sorted(s2) + 1
